definitions.title: Pe.
definitions.body: mpl. 3 mpl.[[יֵאבַ֫דוּ]] (not [[וּן]]- v. K § 26, 1) Je 10:11 they shall persish, pass away.

definitions.title: Haph.
definitions.body: (O Aram.[[האבד]] Lzb:205 Cooke:189) destoy: Impf. 2 ms. [[אַל־תְּהוֹבֵד]] (K:§ 41 c) Da 2:24(c.[[ל]] pers.); 3 mpl. [[יְהוֹבְדוּן]] v:Da 2:18(indef. subj.; acc. pers.); Inf.  [[לְהוֹבָדָא]] v:Da 2:12, v:Da 2:24 (both c.[[ל]] pers.), [[דָה]]- Da 7:26 (abs.).

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: (K:§ 41 c W:CG 225) be destroyed: Pf. 3 ms. [[הוּבַד]] Da 7:11.
